title: On P\'olya groups of some non-Galois number fields
abstract:
We prove two conjectures proposed by Chabert and Halberstadt concerning
P\'olya groups of $S_4$-fields and $D_4$-fields. More generally, the latter
will be proved for $D_n$-fields with $n \geq 4$ an even integer. Further,
generalizing a result of Zantema, we also prove that the pre-P\'olya group of a
non-Galois field of a prime degree, e.g. an $A_5$-field, coincides with its
P\'olya group.
